tool_description: Combines multiple detection results to assess overall content severity and risk level, providing comprehensive content safety scoring.

content_duration.description: Duration of content in seconds (use 0 for static images)

age_rating_context.description: Target age rating context: G, PG, PG13, R, or unrated

error_messages: Invalid score values: All score parameters must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid duration: content_duration must be non-negative.
Empty categories: At least one detected category must be provided if any scores are above 0.0.
Invalid age rating: Use one of [G, PG, PG13, R, unrated].
Severity calculation failed: Could not compute content severity assessment.
usage: Provide violence_score, gore_score, content_duration, and detected_categories. Optionally include audio_violence_score, context_factors, and age_rating_context for more accurate assessment.

risk_level.description: Risk classification: low, moderate, high, or extreme
